word_mean: 蛋白胨：一种由酸或酶引起天然蛋白质部分水解所产生的蛋白衍生物或其裂解混合物。胨易溶于水，不能由热，碱或饱和硫酸铵所沉淀

sentence.Network_en: As a result, something in peptone was its growth factor.
sentence.Network_cn: 初步鉴定出蛋白胨中的某些物质是它的生长因子.

sentence.Network_en: PDA or with 0.3 % peptone in it was suitable for mother - culture media.
sentence.Network_cn: 选用基础培养基或在基础培养基中添加0.3%蛋白胨作为绣球菌母种培养基较为合适.

sentence.Network_en: This peptone is rich in protein.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种蛋白胨的蛋白质含量极高.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from German Pepton, from Greek pepton, neuter of peptos 'cooked, digested'

means.word_mean: 1. any of various water-soluble compounds that form by hydrolysis in the digestion of proteins to amino acids
